name: Vegan Milkshakes - Dark Chocolate & Mocha Chocolate
description: Thick, rich and healthy, these chocolate shakes made with Almond Milk , cocoa powder and dates are my favorite vegan milkshakes ever! Try either my Vegan Mocha Chocolate Shake or my Dark Chocolate Milkshake for the ultimate treat - both are dairy-free and made without refined sugar. Allergy Information: Free of dairy, egg, corn, soy, yeast, gluten, grain. It can be made nut-free with nut-free milk.
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons chocolate chips (I used 1 Tablespoon Chocolate chips and 1 Tablespoon Carob chips)
2 teaspoons almond milk (So Delicious unsweetened or other brand)
1 tablespoon ground raw sugar (or use soaked Medjool dates)
1/2 teaspoon instant coffee or equivalent brewed coffee
1 to 1.5 cups So Delicious Vanilla unsweetened Cashew milk (or use other non dairy milk + vanilla extract)
3-4  Medjool dates  (soaked for 10 minutes in warm water)

recipeInstructions.name: How to make Mocha Chocolate Shake in a cup (using a microwave):

itemListElement.text: Add the chocolate chips and 2 teaspoons almond milk into a cup.
itemListElement.name: Add the chocolate chips and 2 teaspoons almond milk into a cup.

itemListElement.text: Microwave for 30 seconds. Keep whisking until chocolate is well blended.
itemListElement.name: Microwave for 30 seconds. Keep whisking until chocolate is well blended.

itemListElement.text: Add the sugar and coffee and blend into the chocolate.
itemListElement.name: Add the sugar and coffee and blend into the chocolate.

itemListElement.text: Add 3/4 cup almond milk 1/4 cup at a time and whisk into the chocolate-coffee mixture.
itemListElement.name: Add 3/4 cup almond milk 1/4 cup at a time and whisk into the chocolate-coffee mixture.

itemListElement.text: Add chilled water(optional for a lighter shake), whisk briskly, taste and adjust sweet.
itemListElement.name: Add chilled water(optional for a lighter shake), whisk briskly, taste and adjust sweet.

itemListElement.text: Serve immediately as is, or topped with ice-cream or whipped coconut cream.
itemListElement.name: Serve immediately as is, or topped with ice-cream or whipped coconut cream.

recipeInstructions.name: Mocha Chocolate Shake made in a blender and no microwave:

itemListElement.text: In a pan, add the chocolate chips and 2-3 teaspoons almond milk and heat on medium heat.
itemListElement.name: In a pan, add the chocolate chips and 2-3 teaspoons almond milk and heat on medium heat.

itemListElement.text: Keep whisking and take off the heat as the chocolate chips begin to melt. (Or use double boiler method). Whisk until well melted.
itemListElement.name: Keep whisking and take off the heat as the chocolate chips begin to melt. (Or use double boiler method). Whisk until well melted.

itemListElement.text: In a blender, add the rest of the ingredients and the melted chocolate.
itemListElement.name: In a blender, add the rest of the ingredients and the melted chocolate.

recipeInstructions.name: Dark Chocolate Milk Shake made in a Blender:

itemListElement.text: Add everything to the blender. Blend, taste and adjust for sweetness and chocolate flavor.
itemListElement.name: Add everything to the blender. Blend, taste and adjust for sweetness and chocolate flavor.

itemListElement.text: Blend and serve as is or topped with non-dairy whipped cream or ice cream.
itemListElement.name: Blend and serve as is or topped with non-dairy whipped cream or ice cream.

keywords: vegan chocolate shake, vegan milkshake recipes, vegan mocha shake
